plot: The first edition of MTV Europe's annual awards show, live from Berlin, Germany, hosted by Tom Jones and featuring performances from Prince, Björk, Roxette, Aerosmith, Ace of Base and more.
title: MTV Europe Music Awards 1994
plot_es: The first edition of MTV Europe's annual awards show, live from Berlin, Germany, hosted by Tom Jones and featuring performances from Prince, Björk, Roxette, Aerosmith, Ace of Base and more.
plot_en: The first edition of MTV Europe's annual awards show, live from Berlin, Germany, hosted by Tom Jones and featuring performances from Prince, Björk, Roxette, Aerosmith, Ace of Base and more.

cast.role: Himself - Free Your Mind Award Recipient
